main_definition: NTSC stands for National Television System Committee, a standard for analog television encoding that was primarily used in North America and parts of Asia.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A video game console manufactured by Nintendo
meanings_and_examples.example: The Nintendo 64 console revolutionized the gaming industry when it was released.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Nintendo Technical Support Center, a support center for Nintendo consoles and products
meanings_and_examples.example: If my Wii U is not working properly, I should contact the NTSC for assistance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: NTSC video game emulation software or hardware
meanings_and_examples.example: I enjoy playing old NTSC games on my modern PC using an emulator like DOSBox.
